automated_decision.label: automated_decision
automated_decision.text: Initial content moderation is performed algorithmically, with subsequent human review in certain cases.

human_review.label: human_review
human_review.text: Decisions are made by our systems unless you exercise your right to request human review.

human_review.label: human_review
human_review.text: Decisions about service eligibility are partially automated, with human oversight for appeals.
